channel.title: Organizing Data on DefectDojo Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Organizing Data on DefectDojo Documentation

item.title: Product Hierarchy: Overview
item.description: DefectDojo uses five main data classes to organize your work: Product Types, Products, Engagements, Tests, and Findings. DefectDojo is made to be flexible to conform to your team, rather than making your team conform to the tool.

item.title: Filter Index
item.description: Note: Currently this article only covers Finding Filters available in the DefectDojo Pro Beta UI, but this article will be expanded in the future to govern more object types, along with Open-Source filters.

item.title: Product Health Grade
item.description: DefectDojo can calculate a grade for your Products based on the amount of Findings contained within. Grades are ranked from A - F.
